attributes.action: publically respond to the claims in the documentary "The Great Global Warming Swindle" that climate change is natural.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The Great Global Warming Swindle" debunked huge swathes of so called 'fact' being spouted under a 'green' banner...yet there has been little or no response to the claims made. Is this because it exposed a reality the government do not want to admit to, or because the 'fact' the the programme was wrong?

A public 'response' to the documentary would be extremely interesting

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/StopClimateTax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
